c74object.name: sonus.quadpanner
c74object.digest: Returns the gains of a quadraphonic setup
c74object.description: Returns the gains of a quadraphonic setup

objarg.name: X position
objarg.digest: Initial X position, from left to right (0..1)
objarg.description: Initial X position, from left to right (0..1).

objarg.name: Y position
objarg.digest: Initial Y position, from front to rear (0..1)
objarg.description: Initial Y position, from front to rear (0..1).

method.name: float
method.description: Coordinate. Left to right on first inlet and front to rear on second inlet (0..1)

attribute.name: x
attribute.digest: X position, from front to rear (0..1)
attribute.description: X position, from front to rear (0..1).

attribute.name: y
attribute.digest: Y position, from front to rear (0..1)
attribute.description: Y position, from front to rear (0..1).
